author: cnbc.com
title: Trovagene reports 4Q loss
text:
SAN DIEGO (AP) _ Trovagene Inc. (TROV) on Monday reported a loss of $2.6 million in its fourth quarter.
On a per-share basis, the San Diego-based company said it had a loss of 6 cents.
The molecular diagnostic company posted revenue of $185,000 in the period.
For the year, the company reported that its loss narrowed to $24.9 million, or 72 cents per share. Revenue was reported as $505,000.
In the final minutes of trading on Monday, the company's shares hit 32 cents. A year ago, they were trading at $2.
